fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a player at night and curse them to die in three nights' time.
- Choose a player and curse them to unable to use abilities on odd days/nights from now on.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players will be notified when you curse them, and will know the specific effect applied to them.
- Both curses can be removed by any effect that purges negative effects.
- You cannot use either ability two nights in a row.
- Control and Redirect immunity.
